name: FreightRoll, Inc.
description: Developer of a digital trade documentation and visibility platform designed to improve visibility into the supply chain. The company's platform provides a dashboard that features access to a proprietary network of carriers, book shipments, uploads loading statuses and prevents deadhead, enabling users to operate shipping activities efficiently.
